title: URGOD LEGENDARY SKIN!
body:
ZEUS+URGOT = Legendary skin, maybe make him viable as an adc again (added at the same time as the skin to provide super hype).

Personally i love urgot his norm skin and other skins are ok battlecast is by far my least favourite because its serious.

Plz rito ily

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dkRoZBvc,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-16T02:01:06.685+0000)
>
> We need a Gentlemen Urgot.
> 
> http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lulb7btRdi1qkjfsyo1_500.png

Skin pack could be Gentlemens club skin pack including cho and other gentleman skins, Lel
i could totally see urgot in a chiton lying on a walking bed with his hand outstretched like in that painting and throwing lightning bolts that would be amazing {{champion:6}} love <3

> [{quoted}](name=Duh Asian Ninja,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dkRoZBvc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-13T11:23:56.452+0000)
>
> i could totally see urgot in a chiton lying on a walking bed with his hand outstretched like in that painting and throwing lightning bolts that would be amazing {{champion:6}} love <3

Upvote for urgod < urgod is love, urgod is life
